attributes.action: make witchcraft an official GSCE subject
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want to make it widely available to study witchcraft and spell casting at both GCSE and A level. We feel it is a valuable life skill which at the minute is being undervalued.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
